comments.body: I'm not totally comfortable just dropping those notices, so I added this note here. Not sure if it's any better, though.
I think it's better to preserve attribution. Aside from what's required from Apache2 license, what goes into NOTICE is up to us so I think this is a fine location for this.
I agree. We should preserve attribution if we can. "Community first".

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +14,18 @@The streams-scala (streams/streams-scala) module was donated by Lightbend and the original code was copyrighted by them:
